About Me

I first learned to code in high school in basic JavaScript class that showed me what is possible with programming. I learned as much as I could outside of school about web development through courses on Udemy and with the help of Youtube. To further fuel my passion, I have attended an Accelerated Coding Bootcamp, LearningFuze in Orange County, CA. Luckily I was able to grow my skills and now I am professional Front-End/Full-Stack Developer.

AdMe

An application that connects companies and content creators with campaigns and prizes.

Nile - VR Web Store

Great place to order your favorite VR consoles and games! A full stack LAMP and React shopping cart app that is a single-page React application and a dynamic PHP API, that uses cookies to keep track of the user with sessions.

Jungle Mix Up

Matching card game made with Javascript, jQuery, HTML, and CSS.
